full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
===============

**Tender Title**
---------------

K3E33-240033: Supply and Delivery of Helium Gas Cylinders for Aerological Programs

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS4106703099

**Amendment Number**
-------------------

2

**Publication Date**
-------------------

October 27, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

December 7, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Description**
---------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of compressed helium gas cylinders for aerological programs.

**Deliverables**
----------------

* Compressed helium gas cylinders meeting the requirements specified in the solicitation documents
* Delivery of the cylinders to various locations across Canada, including Inukjuak, Kuujjuaq, LaGrande IV, Maniwaki, Sept-Îles, and Burlington (Ontario)

**Eligibility**
--------------

This tender is open to all interested suppliers. The solicitation documents can be accessed through the original source, which includes detailed information about the requirements, delivery locations, and submission procedures.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For more information about this tender, please contact:

Adina Ayassou (SPAC/PSPC)
[Email](mailto:adina.ayassou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
[Phone](tel:)

**Note**
-----

The tender closing date is December 7, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time). Late submissions will not be accepted. It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure that their submission is received by the above-mentioned deadline.

This tender announcement is for informational purposes only and may be subject to changes or modifications. Suppliers should carefully review the solicitation documents for the most up-to-date information. Until such a point, no effort or consideration shall be made to fulfill the RFCA as accepted by trade professional last submitted, this amendment ends.




Please note that the response must be presented in a clean Google
